katrenko.ws
Class TestModel

java.lang.Object
  katrenko.ws.TestModel

public class TestModel
extends java.lang.Object

TestModel is a public class which uses several classes to read the input data (test set), a model and its log file. It applies a selected model to the test data and outputs an annotated test set in XML.

          Creates a new instance of TestModel

Method Detail

test_model

public java.lang.String test_model(java.lang.String model_file,
                                   java.lang.String test_file,
                                   java.lang.String input_type)
Applies a model model_file to test_file and returns an annotated test_file. The text data in test_file has to be in the XML format.

Parameters:
model_file - an absolute path to a model
test_file - an absolute path to a test file (XML file with the root tag <doc>)
input_type - input type (has to be "text" in the current release)
Returns:
annotated test_file
